title: Clients Updated
description: Added Tuff Client and updated Astra Client version
notes: Added Tuff Client and updated Astra Client version.

title: Site Update: Modded
description: Added patch notes, bug fixes, and integrated mods!
notes: Added the mod screen, which allows users to select mods, and it'll be added to their eaglerforge launcher. Will override mods added in by user inside of launcher.
Added the patch notes screen, it displays recent updates to the website, and launcher builds.
Fixed a bug of unable to scroll with to many launchers selected.

title: Site Update: Memorized
description: Organized/updated code, added memory options, more games, installations, usernames, and faq screen!
notes: Implemented memory for options selected inside of launcher.
Added wider range of game versions.
Added FAQ screen, answering common easy questions.
Removed bulk code for sleeker function/look.
Organize structure of project for future growth.
